overview: 1. A wife who falls into a host and brings it to her when she has money. She begins to sell her body without her husband's knowledge to pay off the debt she has naturally accrued, and now she begins to fall for something other than a host.  2. A wife who continued her life as a widow thanks to her husband, who was tired every day. One day, she meets her former boss who has become a plumber, and after hearing about her difficult circumstances, she lends a small amount of money, but instead of repaying it over time, she begins to demand her body as well.  At first, she could not help it, but the lewdness of married women burning without her husband's knowledge. Their ejaculation is gradually being tamed
title: Secret Love: Tamed Married Women
